net.wombatrpgs.rainfall.core
Class ScreenStack

java.lang.Object
  net.wombatrpgs.rainfall.core.ScreenStack

public class ScreenStack
extends java.lang.Object

A bunch of screens stacked on top of each other that make up the game environment. Only one should exist per game, probably in the globals manager. This is the object that should be rendering every frame regardless of whatever the hell else is going on.

Field Summary

Constructor Detail

ScreenStack

public ScreenStack()
Creates and initializes a new empty stack of screens.

Method Detail

push

public void push(GameScreen screen)
Pushes a screen to the top of the screen stack. Corrects the z-value of the screen such that it's on the top.

Parameters:
screen - The screen to put on top

pop

public GameScreen pop()
Removes the top screen from the stack. Does not alter z-values.

Returns:
The screen evicted from the top

render

public void render(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.OrthographicCamera camera)
Renders the top screen on the stack.

Parameters:
camera - The camera to render with

sortStack

private void sortStack()
Sorts the stack of game screens by their z-value.

focus

private void focus(GameScreen screen)
Called whenever a screen gains focus.

Parameters:
screen - The screen that gained focus

unfocus

private void unfocus(GameScreen screen)
Called whenever a screen loses focus.

Parameters:
screen - The screen that lost focus
